Package zombicide.weapon

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
zombicide.weapon.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Axe, Chainsaw, Crowbar, Pistol, Rifle
public abstract class Weapon extends Object
Abstract class representing a weapon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, int numberOfDiceThrows, int threshold, int damageValue, int minRange, int maxRange, boolean noise)
      Constructor for the Weapon class.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the weapon.
      numberOfDiceThrows - The number of dice throws for the weapon.
      threshold - The threshold for a successful attack.
      damageValue - The damage value of the weapon.
      minRange - The minimum range of the weapon.
      maxRange - The maximum range of the weapon.
      noise - A boolean indicating whether the weapon makes noise.
